str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To make visible (manifest); hence: I report (inform) against; pass: I appear before. From emphanes; to exhibit or disclose.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To seek after, desire, search for, make inquiries about. From epi and zeteo; to search for; intensively, to demand, to crave.
Fatherland, one's native place. From parasemos; a father-land, i.e. Native town; heavenly home.
